channel.title: The old record box
channel.description:
Cylinder recordings of music and spoken word from late 1890's to 1929; historic recordings of music and speech.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Drifting and dreaming
item.description: This program features songs like "On the Banks of the Wabash;" "Floating Down the Old Monongahela;" "Where the Silvery Colorado Wends Its Way;" and "Beautiful Ohio."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Naughty! Naughty!
item.description: This program features songs like "Waiting at the Church;" "Every Little Movement Has a Meaning of Its Own;" "There's a Little Bit of Bad in Every Good Little Girl;" and "The Bird on Nellie."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Home, sweet home
item.description: This program features songs like "Tuck Me to Sleep in My Old 'tucky Home;" "There's a Girl in the Heart of Maryland;" "I Want to Go Back to Michigan;" and "Home, Sweet Home the World Over."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Listen to the band
item.description: This program features songs like "The American Patrol;" "The Flag of Victory March;" "Invincible Eagle March;" "La-La-La;" and "Stars and Stripes Forever."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: The golden years
item.description: This program features songs like "Put on Your Old Gray Bonnet;" "Silver Threads Among the Gold;" "Just Plain Folks;" and "Golden Wedding."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Over there
item.description: This program features songs like "It's a Long Way to Tipperary;" "Sister Susie's Sewing Shirts for Soldiers;" "Goodbye Broadway, Hello France;" "Send Me Away with a Smile;" and "Madelon."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: A few favorites
item.description: This program features songs like "Red Wing;" "Meet Me Tonight in Dreamland;" "I'm Afraid to Come Home in the Dark;" "Moonlight Bay;" and "Whispering Hope."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: The auld sod
item.description: This program features songs like "Meet Me Down at the Corner;" "The Wearing of the Green;" "Killarney and You;" "Them Were the Happy Days;" and "I'm on My Way to Dublin Bay."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Smartaleck
item.description: This program features songs like "Uncle Josh Buys an Automobile;" "Flanagan on a Farm;" "Rube and the Country Doctor;" and "Down on Uncle Jasper's Farm."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Courtin'
item.description: This program features songs like "Makin' Eyes;" "Peaches and Cream;" "On the Old Front Porch;" and "You'd Be Surprised."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Let's dance
item.description: This program features songs like "Waltz Me Around Again, Willie;" "Pick-a-Chicken;" "Georgia;" "That Tango Tokio Medley;" and "Good Night Waltz."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This program features songs like "The Good Old USA;" "For Sale: A Baby;" "Rainbow;" "The American Flag March;" and "Iola."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology

item.title: A wee bit o' Scotch
item.description: This program features songs like "Harry Lauder Medley;" "Roamin' in the Gloamin';" "Breakfast in Bed;" "I Love a Lassie;" "Same as His Father was Before Him;" and "On the Bonny, Bonny Banks of Loch Lomond."
item.dc:creator: Harrington, Fred C.
item.dc:subject: Sociology
